# Dwarf (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Krynn:* |  |

| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Abbathor]], [[Berronar Truesilver]], Clangeddin, Deep Duerra, [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]], [[Dumathoin]], Gorm Gulthyn, Haela Brightaxe, [[Laduguer]], Marthammor Duin, [[Moradin]], Sharindlar, Thard Harr, Vergadain |

**Granted Powers:** You gain [[Great Fortitude (Feat)|Great Fortitude]] as a bonus feat.

**Dwarf Domain Spells**

**1 [[Magic Weapon (Spell)|Magic Weapon]]:** Weapon gains +1 bonus.

**2 [[Bear's Endurance (Spell)|Bearâ€™s Endurance]]:** Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 minute/level.

**3 [[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|Glyph of Warding]] <sup>M</sup>:** Inscription harms those who pass it.

**4 [[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|Magic Weapon, Greater]]:** +1 bonus/4 levels (max +5).

**5 [[Fabricate (Spell)|Fabricate]]:** Transforms raw material into finished items.

**6 [[Stone Tell (Spell)|Stone Tell]]:** Talk to natural or worked stone.

**7 [[Dictum (Spell)|Dictum]]:** Kills, paralyzes, slows, or deafens nonlawful subjects.

**8 [[Protection From Spells (Spell)|Protection from Spells]] <sup>MF</sup>:** Confers +8 resistance bonus.

**9 [[Elemental Swarm (Spell)|Elemental Swarm]]:** Summons multiple elementals.\*

  \*Earth spell only.
